page.title: 05Health in Eccleshall
page.content: Many of the inhabitants of Eccleshall are orientated towards fitness, judging by the number of sporting clubs available. There is enthusiastic support at evening classes in pop- mobility and yoga, one teacher of the latter being 86 years old. Riding and jogging also have a steady following and there is a growing interest in marathon running. The town is well provided for the treatment of ailments by two doctor's surgeries, one of which is a joint practice; and by a dentist, a dispensing optician, and an osteopath. A new clinic has been built which is served by two midwives who give mothercraft lessons, and a visiting chiropodist, speech therapist and psychologist.
